short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SaveGram is an online Instagram downloader. Support Instagram users to easily save favorite photos and videos to their devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SaveGram is a powerful and user-friendly extension designed to help you quickly save and download your favorite photos or videos from Instagram. Whether you want to keep a memorable photo, save an inspiring video, or simply download content for offline viewing, SaveGram has got you covered.

üî• Main Features of SaveGram

‚úÖ Video Downloader: Download Instagram videos in the highest quality, up to 4K resolution.
‚úÖ Photo Downloader: Save photos from Instagram posts in full size with just a few clicks.
‚úÖ Story Downloader: Download Instagram Stories and Highlights effortlessly.
‚úÖ IG Reels Downloader: Download Reels and IGTV videos for free, ensuring you never miss your favorite content.
‚úÖ InstaDP Downloader: Download Instagram profile pictures in HD quality.

üí° How to Use SaveGram on Chrome Browser

1Ô∏è‚É£ Open Instagram: Launch the Chrome browser and visit Instagram.com.
2Ô∏è‚É£ Select Content: Find the photo or video you want to download.
3Ô∏è‚É£ Download: Tap the "Download" button in the top right corner of the photo or video.
4Ô∏è‚É£ Save File: A new tab will open, displaying the content you want to download. From here, you can save it directly to your device.

üéØ Important Note

After installing the extension, make sure to reload the tab where you wish to download the video or photo so that SaveGram can recognize the file.

We value your feedback and suggestions to enhance the extension's performance! Feel free to contact us with any issues or ideas for improvement.

Start using SaveGram today and enjoy seamless downloading of your favorite Instagram content!
